compliant: We process personal data solely for clearly defined purposes and explain those purposes to our users.
Individuals may request access, correction, or deletion of their personal information through our privacy portal.
Data retention schedules ensure personal data is removed or anonymised once the original purpose has been fulfilled.
We implement encryption, access controls, and regular audits to keep personal data secure.
Consent preferences are stored with timestamps and users can withdraw consent at any time.
We only share data with processors who have signed GDPR-compliant agreements.
Privacy notices describe contact details for our Data Protection Officer and user rights.
Children's data is collected only with verified parental consent and limited to what is necessary.
ambiguous: We may share information with trusted partners to improve our services.
Personal data is retained for as long as it remains useful to us.
Security measures are in place but we cannot guarantee complete protection.
Consent may be assumed when you continue to use the website.
We might use your information for additional purposes compatible with the original reason.
Third parties could receive information where appropriate.
We strive to honour data subject requests whenever practically possible.
Retention periods depend on business needs and legal requirements.
non_compliant: We sell user data to advertisers without providing an opt-out mechanism.
Personal information may be collected and processed without prior notice.
Data is stored indefinitely even when it is no longer required.
We cannot respond to deletion requests or data access inquiries.
Consent banners are omitted because we set cookies automatically.
User data may be disclosed to partners regardless of consent status.
We do not provide users with a method to withdraw their consent.
Children's personal data may be shared for marketing purposes without verification.
